derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin incestus, incestum 'unchastity, incest', from in- 'not' + castus 'chaste'

entry.def: Incest is the crime of two members of the same family having sexual intercourse, for example a father and daughter, or a brother and sister.
